title: 计分板如何编辑！！求大神帮忙！
author: MChuihuang
txt_content:
# Info Board Config, Last Edited in v1.0.0
# =============================================================================
# |        Check for Updates  - Checks for updates on enable                  |
# |---------------------------------------------------------------------------|
# |       Custom Variables allow for you to create your own variables         |
# |                  <Variable>: What it gets replaced to                     |
# |---------------------------------------------------------------------------|
# |     Disabled Worlds    - A List of worlds that won't have scoreboards     |
# | WorldGuard.Prevent Showing In - A List of regions the board won't show in |
# |---------------------------------------------------------------------------|
# | Scrolling Text is a cool feature where text will scroll across the board  |
# |    Currently format codes aren't supported                                |
# |            Shift Time - How long between the text scrolling               |
# =============================================================================

Check for Updates: false
Custom Variables:
  <website>: yoursitehere.net
  <plugindev>: Ktar5
Disabled Worlds:
- DisabledWorld1
- DisabledWorld2
WorldGuard:
  Prevent Showing In:
  - regionNamesAreCapSensitive
  - regionName2
Scrolling Text:
  Enable: false
  Shift Time: 0.25
Update Time: 2

replies.author: 冰星
replies.txt_content: 用notepad++编辑，但是要注意编码格式

replies.author: MChuihuang
replies.txt_content:
冰星 发表于 2019-2-13 20:10
用notepad++编辑，但是要注意编码格式
您会编辑不 能不能帮我编辑一下
